body_html:
Hi,

this is my solution to run it on a CentOS6 machine.

# create dirs
mkdir -p tools/libc6_2.19
cd ~/tools/

#http://stackoverflow.com/questions/33655731/error-while-importing-tensorflow-in-python2-7-in-ubuntu-12-04-glibc-2-17-not-f/34897674#34897674
wget http://launchpadlibrarian.net/198723917/libc6_2.19-0ubuntu6.6_amd64.deb
wget http://launchpadlibrarian.net/198723918/libc6-dev_2.19-0ubuntu6.6_amd64.deb
wget ftp://rpmfind.net/linux/sourceforge/m/ma/magicspecs/apt/3.0/x86_64/RPMS.lib/libstdc++-4.8.2-7mgc30.x86_64.rpm
rpm2cpio libstdc++-4.8.2-7mgc30.x86_64.rpm| cpio -idmv

and run it with:

LD_LIBRARY_PATH="$LD_LIBRARY_PATH:$HOME/tools/libc6_2.19/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/:$HOME/tools/libc6_2.19/usr/lib64/" $HOME/tools/libc6_2.19/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/ld-2.19.so `which python` main.py

body:
Hi,

this is my solution to run it on a CentOS6 machine.

```
# create dirs
mkdir -p tools/libc6_2.19
cd ~/tools/

#http://stackoverflow.com/questions/33655731/error-while-importing-tensorflow-in-python2-7-in-ubuntu-12-04-glibc-2-17-not-f/34897674#34897674
wget http://launchpadlibrarian.net/198723917/libc6_2.19-0ubuntu6.6_amd64.deb
wget http://launchpadlibrarian.net/198723918/libc6-dev_2.19-0ubuntu6.6_amd64.deb
wget ftp://rpmfind.net/linux/sourceforge/m/ma/magicspecs/apt/3.0/x86_64/RPMS.lib/libstdc++-4.8.2-7mgc30.x86_64.rpm
rpm2cpio libstdc++-4.8.2-7mgc30.x86_64.rpm| cpio -idmv
```

and run it with:

```
LD_LIBRARY_PATH="$LD_LIBRARY_PATH:$HOME/tools/libc6_2.19/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/:$HOME/tools/libc6_2.19/usr/lib64/" $HOME/tools/libc6_2.19/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/ld-2.19.so `which python` main.py
```
